title: Drawing, "Tracings of Hebrew Manuscript Illuminations"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Three separate tracings:  at upper left, two Hebrew characters; at upper right; medieval manuscript illumination with Hebrew characters combined with animal motifs; at lower center, three arches resting on columns with Hebrew inscriptions in arch and menorahs between columns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tracings of Hebrew Manuscript Illuminations".
Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-44.
